text:
Hello everyone,

I am currently using ReCAPTCHA v2 in my HubSpot forms and would like to switch to ReCAPTCHA v3. You can find more information on ReCAPTCHA v3 here: <https://developers.google.com/recaptcha/docs/v3|Google ReCAPTCHA v3 Documentation>.

Any guidance on how to integrate ReCAPTCHA v3 with HubSpot forms would be greatly appreciated.

Thank you
